Package org.Users.HDBManager

Class HDBManager

java.lang.Object
org.Users.HDBManager.HDBManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
user
public class HDBManager extends Object implements user
HDBManager contains personal information about the manager, their authentication credentials, permission level, and information about their currently assigned project.

    • HDBManager

      public HDBManager(String userID, String username, String password, String maritalStatus, int age, user.PermissionLevel perms)
      Creates a new HDBManager with complete profile information.
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique ID for this manager
      username - The login username for this manager
      password - The login password for this manager (plain text)
      maritalStatus - The marital status of the manager
      age - The age of the manager
      perms - The permission level assigned to this manager
